ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New UI
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Karana faction? Woohoo! She s not KOS! I spent months killing gnolls in highpass and such to improve my faction with Karanas residents. I can safely enter
ygData.messageBody:
> > I'm DLing the patch right now. Says I have over 3 hours left. 21.6k
> > connection can really suck sometimes.
> > I hope it doesn't lag too badly. I wonder if my darkelf wizard is kos in
> > jaggedpine.. I hope not.
> Your DE Wizard will most certainly be KOS to the residents of Jaggedpine.
> To get to Jaggedpine, you need to go thru Surefall Glade, which you will
> also be KOS.
> Jaggedpine residents are on a Karana faction.
>
Karana faction? Woohoo! She's not KOS! I spent months killing gnolls in
highpass and such to improve my faction with Karanas residents. I can safely
enter surefall glade without being attacked or anything. :-)
luv,
-Su
